channel.title: C# on Striking Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in C# on Striking Thoughts

item.title: Camp Fireworks
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: An environment where friends can shoot fireworks safely (social distancing, no harm from fireworks, but do watch out for your furniture).

item.title: Perspective Wand
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: One of the mechanics of Superluminal reimagined in VR. THis game mechanic is mind-bending in VR.

item.title: Save a Mole
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: A quick little game that I made in about a day for the GTMK 2023 themed ‘roles reversed’. In here, instead of wahcking a mole, you have to save it, but as a player, you can reverse your role and become a game designer and switch up the game mechanics to play whack a human if you would like.

item.title: Ionic Defender
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: Roast space rocks and defend the city from Bacterion!

item.title: Space Monks
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: A combat system where the health of all players are joined together

item.title: Giant Octopus
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: Play as a giant defense kraken in VR, or as an AR assistant on handhelds and Hololens

item.title: Missile Mania
item.author: tiago@somda.net (Striking Thoughts)
item.description: Stranded in a moon with only a flamming baseball bat and a shield to defend yourself from alien missiles!
